member.name: T:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName
member.summary: Description of default roles

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.SystemUser
member.summary: Standard role assigned to all system users; the role contains basic user functions like change the user language or switching to dark team.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.Employee
member.summary: Default employee privileges for the license modules; depending on the module you can either initiate a request or see your own personal information.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.Manager
member.summary: Oversees employees reporting to his position, monitoring progress, and generating business reports.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.HumanResources
member.summary: Involved in overseeing the broader aspects of employees, such as compliance with labor laws, integration with payroll systems, and analysis of overall workforce time expenditure.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.Recruiter
member.summary: Identifying potential hires to interviewing and evaluating candidates, updating job ads and conducting background checks.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.Finance
member.summary: Utilizes timesheet data for payroll processing, budgeting, and financial planning. May also be responsible for assigning tasks, customers or projects, monitoring progress, and generating reports and run payroll.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.Auditor
member.summary: Responsible for ensuring accuracy and compliance. Auditors for example might review timesheets for irregularities or inconsistencies.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.Browse
member.summary: This role is designed for service desk or reception workers typically allows them to look up basic employee information. This role might include permissions to access details such as employee names, job titles, contact information, and office locations. This access helps receptionists and service desk staff efficiently direct visitors, answer queries, and perform their duties effectively.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.Payroll
member.summary: Responsible for running periodic payrolls, typically allows them to access essential employee information needed for payroll processing.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.ProjectManager
member.summary: Responsable for oversees the accurate and timely submission of employee timesheets, ensuring compliance with company policies and labor laws.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.TrainingManager
member.summary: A Training and Development Manager is responsible for creating and implementing training programs to enhance employee skills and performance. They develop training materials, conduct sessions, oversee development programs, and update training initiatives to meet organizational needs. Essential skills include instructional design, curriculum development, and industry experience. They also manage training budgets and stay updated with the latest training trends.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.ApplicationSupport
member.summary: Provides technical support for the application. This includes troubleshooting, updating software, and assisting users with technical issues.

member.name: F:Hrm.Shared.App.Constants.DefaultRoleName.ApplicationAdmin
member.summary: Provides full access to the application setup tables like labels, themes, dashboards and security setup

member.name: T:Hrm.Shared.App.Exceptions.ItemAlreadyExistsException
member.summary: this is for handle the exception. If item is already exist with same name or key

member.name: M:Hrm.Shared.App.Extensions.CustomRegexes.ReplaceWhiteSpace
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\s+
Explanation:
○ Match a whitespace character atomically at least once.

member.name: M:Hrm.Shared.App.Extensions.CustomRegexes.RegexForIdentificationNumber
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[^a-zA-Z0-9]
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [^0-9A-Za-z].

member.name: M:Hrm.Shared.App.Utils.RGB.RgbRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
rgb\\((?<r>\\d{1,3}),\\s*(?<g>\\d{1,3}),\\s*(?<b>\\d{1,3})\\)
Explanation:
○ Match the string "rgb(".
○ "r" capture group.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 1 and at most 3 times.
○ Match ','.
○ Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ "g" capture group.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 1 and at most 3 times.
○ Match ','.
○ Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ "b" capture group.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 1 and at most 3 times.
○ Match ')'.

member.name: M:Hrm.Shared.App.Utils.RGB.ParseToRgbRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
(?<r>[0-9a-fA-F]{2})(?<g>[0-9a-fA-F]{2})(?<b>[0-9a-fA-F]{2})
Explanation:
○ "r" capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Fa-f] exactly 2 times.
○ "g" capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Fa-f] exactly 2 times.
○ "b" capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Fa-f] exactly 2 times.

member.name: M:Hrm.Shared.App.Utils.RGB.RgbaRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
rgba\\((?<r>\\d{1,3}),\\s*(?<g>\\d{1,3}),\\s*(?<b>\\d{1,3}),\\s*(?<a>\\d?\\.?\\d+)\\)
Explanation:
○ Match the string "rgba(".
○ "r" capture group.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 1 and at most 3 times.
○ Match ','.
○ Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ "g" capture group.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 1 and at most 3 times.
○ Match ','.
○ Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ "b" capture group.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 1 and at most 3 times.
○ Match ','.
○ Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ "a" capture group.
○ Match a Unicode digit greedily, optionally.
○ Match '.' atomically, optionally.
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least once.
○ Match ')'.

member.name: T:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord
member.summary: Represents the record of an employee in Microsoft Entra. see: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0#properties

member.name: P:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier for the user. Inherited from directoryObject. Key. Not nullable. Read-only.

member.name: P:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord.UserPrincipalName
member.summary: The user principal name (UPN) of the user. The UPN is an Internet-style login name for the user based on the Internet standard RFC 822. By convention, this should map to the user's email name. The general format is alias@domain, where domain must be present in the tenant’s collection of verified domains. This property is required when a user is created. Supports $filter and $orderby.

member.name: P:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord.AccountEnabled
member.summary: true if the account is enabled; otherwise, false. This property is required when a user is created. Supports $filter.

member.name: P:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord.DisplayName
member.summary: The name displayed in the address book for the user. This is usually the combination of the user's first name, middle initial, and last name. This property is required when a user is created and it supports $filter and $orderby.

member.name: P:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord.GivenName
member.summary: The given name (first name) of the user. Supports $filter.

member.name: P:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord.JobTitle
member.summary: The user’s job title. Supports $filter.

member.name: P:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord.MobilePhone
member.summary: The primary cellular telephone number for the user.

member.name: P:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord.Surname
member.summary: The user's surname (family name or last name). Supports $filter.

member.name: P:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord.CompanyName
member.summary: The company name which the user is associated. This property can be useful for describing the company that an external user comes from. Supports $filter.

member.name: P:Hrm.Shared.Connectors.MicrosoftEntra.Tables.MicrosoftEntraEmployee.EntraRecord.Department
member.summary: The name for the department in which the user works. Supports $filter.
